item.title: A little bit about me
item.description: Hello world! I’m Cris; a Spaniard in love with London, where I’ve been living since 2013. Although I had always enjoyed creative tasks as drawing and painting; I opted for a more technical career and I absolutely love it! I am passionate about solving problems, coding and the feel when something you have built actually works! I worked as a web developer for a couple of years before I decided to make a change to the exciting world of AI and games.
